pullRequest.title: Add JPP flag for inline types
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add JPP flag for inline types
Merging adds a new JPP flag for inline types.
Related to: #10078
Signed-off-by: Oussama Saoudi oussama.saoudi@ibm.com

beforeCommit.message:
Added jpp configuration for inline types

Added INLINETYPES configuration which depends on Java 15.

Signed-off-by: Oussama Saoudi <oussama.saoudi@ibm.com>

afterCommit.message:
Added jpp configuration for inline types
Added INLINETYPES version flag to pre-processor for use as Java flag,
depends on Java15 version.

Related to: https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/issues/10078
Depends on: https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/pull/10337

Signed-off-by: Oussama Saoudi <oussama.saoudi@ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText:
This was not merged properly: the list of flags should be:
    flags="INLINE-TYPES,OPENJDK_METHODHANDLES"
